name: Ultra Ninja Shooter
description:
Ultra Ninja Shooter is a physics-based shooting game where you strike ninja stars to destroy the targets. Throw out your shuriken and eliminate all the enemies!
After entering the game, select the level. Click the mouse to launch the knife. Destroy all enemies. there is a limit to the number of blades you can use, and destroy the enemy before you run out of blades. Points are awarded according to the number of kills and the use of flying knives.
This is a cartoon ninja style casual strategy game.There are 20+ levels, each of which requires a blade to kill enemies.The clever setup of each level will give you a lot to think about.Click the mouse to launch the blade.Let's see who can stop you.
